          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vpliv višine tal na potencialno energijo</string>
            <string language="en">Choice of Zero for Potential Energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wahl von null für mögliche Energie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Choix de zéro pour l'énergie potentielle</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Opción de cero para la energía potencial</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Primer pretvorbe potencialne v kinetično energijo na primeru odbijajoče žoge.</string>
            <string language="en">Transformation of potencial into kinetic energy in an example of bouncing ball.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

Energie in einem Beispiel des Aufprallens der Kugel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transformation de potencial dans l'énergie 
cinétique dans un exemple de rebondir la boule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transformação de potencial na energia cinética
em um exemplo de saltar a esfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasformazione di potencial in energia cinetica

ένα παράδειγμα της αναπηδώντας σφαίρας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transformación de potencial en energía
